WorkItem.Description:
I posted in Discussions yesterday about 2.2.27 supporting the current 3.3 patch model for Trees. Now it seems the same question can be related to v2.3.0, what I'm getting at is if it is supported then should I post some of the things I found so far?
Â 
ie..
-GotEM talent 
-No Tier 10 Bonuses
-No Frost emblem Idol

Comments.Message:
I think the talents was implemented correctly, but the tooltip is has not been...i just cleared the talent then put them back point by point and each point raised my overall haste...although its probably affected by Improved mark of the wild...i start with 8.15% haste and after 5/5 GotEM I end up with 18.96%
with 1 point-10.31% 2-12.48% 3-14.64 4-16.8% and with 5 points 18.96% total

So in 2.3.1 it seems GotEM calculates correctly, however tool-tip still reads incorrectly. Minor issue.
No tier 10 bonuses and no frost idol yet.

Any idea when these may be addressed?

v2.3.2:
- Where as 2.3.1 seemed to have correct talent GotEM, wrong tool-tip, both are in correct in this version
- No Frost emblem idol... notes say it was added?

Side note: T10 bonuses are added, hooray thank you
Um, actually the Frost emblem idol was added in the parser, but it was not refreshed in the cache. I've done that manually now.
